name: Ocean Combat
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 17!

Battle against another ship in this action multiplayer game!

Features:
- 4 different ships to choose;
- Single player and multiplayer;
- Different difficulty levels;
- XBOX Controller support (think it as how it would be in Nintendo Switch);

Credits:
Bruno Aguiar - Game Design, Sound Design
Suikou Gin - Art, Game Design, Programming

Any kind of feedback will be appreciated <3
